div.style: float: left; text-align: left; position: relative;

ul.li: ​Multiple Extracurricular Opportunities including Athletics, Band, Board Game Club, Drama, eSports, FFA, NHS, Robotics, and Student Council.

li.strong: Over twenty different Computer Science offerings at the High School including Animation, Game Design, Programming, and Web Design.
Numerous Student-Driven activities including Activity Day, Assemblies, Dances, Lock-in, and Talent Show.
Multiple AP and Dual Enrollment courses including AP Bio, AP Computer Science A, AP Computer Science Principles, AP Psychology, and AP Stats.

font.strong: ​Two Pre-school Programs: GSRP and Little Pirates (in-house).
